proposedChanges.value: Reorganize hero section to include a clear, concise headline and a standout hero image.
proposedChanges.rationale: Enhances clarity and immediately communicates product value.

proposedChanges.value: Position the hero CTA prominently above the fold on both desktop and mobile.
Condense problem section to highlight key pain points with bullet points.
proposedChanges.rationale: Improves readability and focus on user issues.

proposedChanges.value: Use a side-by-side comparison layout to clearly differentiate solution benefits.
Introduce trust badges and client testimonials near the hero CTA.
proposedChanges.rationale: Establishes credibility and builds initial trust.

proposedChanges.value: Simplify pricing table with clear headings and highlight the most popular plan.
proposedChanges.rationale: Facilitates quick understanding of pricing options.

proposedChanges.value: Reorder sections to place trust elements immediately after the hero.
proposedChanges.rationale: Increases trust early in the user journey.

proposedChanges.value: Ensure all CTAs are consistently visible on mobile devices.
proposedChanges.rationale: Maintains conversion opportunities on mobile platforms.
